39045.ラニアッカ断層帯にある\n古代の転送装置に 戻りますか？<yesno><brea:
Would you like to go back to the
ancient transporter in the Raniakka
Fault Zone?<yesno><break>

33740.「ここは カルサドラ火山。\n 私は この辺りを調査している\n ドルワーム王立:
This is Calsadora Volcano. I am a
scholar at the Royal Dolworm Research
Institute who is studying this area.

33741.「ここは カルサドラ火山。\n 魔瘴石が豊富にあることで 有名でしたが\n ほと:
This is Calsadora Volcano, famous for its abundance of demon miasma stone, but most of it seems to have been
taken away. Therefore, to get demon miasma stones from now on, you have to go quite deep into the volcano. Please
be careful.

33742.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「おおっ 小さい:
Wow, it looks like you received a demon miasma stone, albeit a small one! You should take it to the Royal
Institute of Dolworm to receive your reward. Director Dura will be very pleased.
